mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_id as customerId, c.customer_nickname as customerNickname, c.customer_photo as customerPhoto, c.customer_email as customerEmail, c.customer_phone as customerPhone, c.customer_password as customerPassword, c.customer_address as customerAddress, c.custome_sex as customeSex, c.personal_about as personalAbout, c.create_time as createTime, p.position_id as positionId, p.position_name as positionName FROM customer c LEFT JOIN position p ON c.position_id = p.position_id ${ew.customSqlsegment}
